name: L-System Fractals
description: Generate beautiful botanical and geometric fractals from simple rewriting rules. Features 10 presets including Barnsley Fern, Dragon Curve, and Koch Snowflake with adjustable iterations and angles.

name: Reaction Diffusion
description: Gray-Scott model reaction-diffusion simulator. Watch chemical patterns emerge from simple rules â€” mitosis, coral, spirals, spots, stripes, and mazes.

name: Conway's Game of Life
description: Interactive cellular automaton simulator with preset patterns like Glider, Pulsar, and Glider Gun. Watch life emerge from simple rules.

name: Wolf Pack Hunting
description: Emergent predator-prey behavior simulation. Watch wolf packs coordinate to hunt prey using realistic flocking and pursuit algorithms.

name: Fursona Generator
description: Random fursona character generator. Get a unique species, colors, personality, accessories, and special features. For when you need a new identity.

name: Life Engine
description: Cellular automaton simulating biological evolution. Organisms eat, reproduce, mutate, and compete through natural selection with multiple cell types.

name: Boids Flocking
description: Classic boids flocking simulation with adjustable separation, alignment, and cohesion parameters. Watch emergent swarm behavior in real-time.
